changeSet.author: irazin
changeSet.comment: Add sample statistics for Signatera primer designer pipeline
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO `prodlims`.`qc_statistics_type` (`description`, `name`, `applicability`) VALUES ('Median variant allele frequency within 16-plex pool', 'POOL_MEDIAN_VAF_METRIC', 'ALL'), ('Median rank of variants within 16-plex pool', 'POOL_MEDIAN_RANK_METRIC', 'ALL'), ('Total number of transversions for 16-plex pool', 'POOL_SOMATIC_TRANSVERSIONS_METRIC', 'ALL'), ('Total number of transitions for 16-plex pool', 'POOL_SOMATIC_TRANSITIONS_METRIC', 'ALL'), ('Total number of small insertion/deletion for 16-plex pool', 'POOL_SOMAITC_INDELS_METRIC', 'ALL'), ('The number of assay in the 16-plex pool', 'NUMBER_OF_ASSAYS_IN_POOL_METRIC', 'ALL'), ('Median motif bucket ID for 16-plex pool', 'POOL_MEDIAN_MOTIF_BUCKET_METRIC', 'ALL'), ('The number of hotspot mutations in16-plex pool', 'POOL_HOTSPOT_MUTATIONS_METRIC', 'ALL');
